nodes.text: The Antemeridian sector was in the Outer Rim Territories adjacent to Meridian sector. The sector capital planet was Antemeridias.

During Imperial rule, the sector was governed by Moff Getelles. After the Battle of Endor, the Antemeridian sector became an independent sector ruled by the Moff Getelles. However Getelles stayed allied with the Empire and later Pellaeon's Imperial Remnant.

In 13 ABY, Getelles tried to take control of the Meridian sector, but was defeated by the New Republic before Admiral Pellaeon could intervene. The sector fall under New Republic control until it was invaded during the Yuuzhan Vong War.
At the end of the Second Galactic Civil War, however, the sector was again in Imperial's hand and was governed by Moff Getelles, that was at that time a supporter of Jagged Fel.
